content: virtue crochet along 2022 virtue is an 8 part crochet along which begins friday 30th september 2022 each part will be published on a friday uk time you will be able to find the pattern and links to videos each week on my website and also in my facebook group helen s hookaholics 1 to download the pattern you will need to sign up for a free membership on my website you can read about becoming a member here 2 there will be lots of help and support in my facebook group helen s hookaholics 3 we will be making a full-sized square blanket there is also a baby blanket option how much yarn will you need there will be 2 yarn packs available from wool warehouse links can be found on my website the total amount of yarn needed allowing for colour changes is naturals cotton bamboo approx 3600 metres 3950 yards 3 5mm hook finished size 134 5cm / 53 inches similar to 4-ply whirls/twirls normal double knit yarn #3 weight 8-ply approx 4500 metres 4921 yards 4mm g hook finished size 165cm / 65 inches aran worsted #4 weight 10-ply approx 4704 metres 5144 yards 5 mm h hook finished size 178 cm / 70 inches how much yarn you need depends on how many colours you chose to use please see the details of the yarn packs to give you an idea for more information see 1 https //www facebook com/groups/helenshookaholics 2 https //crystalsandcrochet com/becoming-a-member-of-crystals-and-crochet/ 3 https //www facebook com/groups/helenshookaholics
